description: Rework is working on something completely new, namely making it possible to play Roblox on Windows 8.1 again! CAUTION EVEN IF YOU CAN NOW PLAY ROBLOX AGAIN ON WINDOWS 8.1, ENJOY IT WITH CAUTION BECAUSE PROBLEMS MAY OCCUR AND REWORK CANNOT BE HELD RESPONSIBLE IF THE COMPUTER OR YOUR ROBLOX ACCOUNT IS DELETED. REWORK THEREFORE RECOMMEND CREATING A NEW CLIENT JUST FOR THIS CLIENT TO KEEP YOUR MAIN ROBLOX ACCOUNT SECURE
